name: Carrier Global Corporation
headquarters: Palm Beach Gardens, Florida, United States
summary: Carrier Global Corporation is a leading provider of advanced heating, ventilation, air conditioning, refrigeration, fire, security, and building automation technologies worldwide. Founded in 1915 and headquartered in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida, Carrier serves residential, commercial, and industrial customers through a portfolio of innovative, sustainable, and intelligent solutions. The company operates globally with a strong focus on energy efficiency, digital innovation, and healthy indoor environments.
